name: Scene

methods.name: Scene()
methods.content: Creates a new scene for the Theater. A scene is a set of steps of animation, such as drawing an image, text or a shape. A scene can also include sound, like playing a sound file or musical notes

methods.name: int getWidth()
methods.content: Returns the width of the theater canvas in pixels.

methods.name: int getHeight()
methods.content: Returns the height of the theater canvas, in pixels.

methods.name: void clear(String color)
methods.content: Clear the canvas and set the background to the given color name.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"color","type":"String","description":"The name of the color to clear the canvas with. If the name does not match a known color or hex value, this method will set the background to black."}]

methods.name: void playSound(String filename)
methods.content: Plays the sound referenced by the file name.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"filename","type":"String","required":true,"description":"the file to play in the asset manager"}]

methods.name: void playNote(int note, double seconds)
methods.content: Plays a note with the default instrument (piano).
methods.parameters: [{"name":"note","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the note to play. 60 represents middle C on a piano."},{"name":"seconds","type":"double","required":true,"description":"length of the note"}]

methods.name: void playNoteAndPause(int note, double seconds)
methods.content: Plays a note with the default instrument (piano) and adds a pause in drawing/audio for the duration of the note, so that subsequent play commands begin after the note has finished playing.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"note","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the note to play. 60 represents middle C on a piano."},{"name":"seconds","type":"double","required":true,"description":"length of the note"}]

methods.name: void pause(double seconds)
methods.content: Wait the provided number of seconds before performing the next draw or play command.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"seconds","type":"double","required":true,"description":"The number of seconds to wait. This can be a fraction of a second, but the smallest value can be .1 seconds."}]

methods.name: void drawImage(String filename, int x, int y, int size, double rotation)
methods.content: Draw an image on the canvas at the given location and size.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"filename","type":"String","required":true,"description":"filename the name of the file in the asset manager"},{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the left side of the image in the canvas"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the top of the image in the canvas"},{"name":"size","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the width of the image, in pixels. The height will stretch to make sure the image does not appear distorted."}]
methods.syntax: `public void drawImage(String filename, int x, int y, int size, double rotation)`

methods.name: void setTextStyle(Font font, FontStyle style)
methods.content: Set the font and style to draw text in, e.g. sans-serif, monospaced, italic, etc.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"font","type":"Font","required":true,"description":"the font to draw with"},{"name":"style","type":"FontStyle","required":true,"description":"the style of the font"}]

methods.name: void setTextHeight(int height)
methods.content: Set the size to draw text, defined as the height of the text in pixels.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"height","type":"int","required":true,"description":"height the height of the text to draw"}]

methods.name: void setTextColor(String color)
methods.content: Set the color for drawing text
methods.parameters: [{"name":"color","type":"String","required":true,"description":"The name of the color to draw text in. If the color name cannot be found, this will result in setting the color to black."}]

methods.name: void drawText(String text, int x, int y)
methods.content: Draws text on the image.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"text","type":"String","required":true,"description":"the text to draw"},{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the distance from the left side of the image to draw the text."},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the distance from the top of the image to draw the text."}]
methods.syntax: `public void drawText(String text, int x, int y)`

methods.name: void drawLine(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
methods.content: Draw a line on the canvas.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"startX","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the beginning X coordinate of the line"},{"name":"startY","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the beginning Y coordinate of the line."},{"name":"endX","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the end X coordinate of the line"},{"name":"endY","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the end Y coordinate of the line"}]
methods.syntax: public final void drawLine(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)

methods.name: void drawRegularPolygon(int x, int y, int sides, int radius)
methods.content: Draw a regular polygon (triangle, square, pentagon, hexagon, etc.) on the canvas.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the center X coordinate of the polygon"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the center Y coordinate of the polygon"},{"name":"sides","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the number of sides of the polygon"},{"name":"radius","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the distance from the center to each point on the polygon"}]
methods.syntax: `public final void drawRegularPolygon(int x, int y, int sides, int radius)`

methods.name: void drawShape(int[] points, boolean close)
methods.content: Draw a shape by connecting the points provided.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"points","type":"int[]","required":true,"description":"an array of numbers representing the points. For instance, a triangle with points (0,10), (30,50), and (20, 60) could be represented as `[0, 10, 30, 50, 20, 60]`."},{"name":"close","type":"boolean","required":true,"description":"whether to close the shape. If this is set to true, the last point and the first point will be connected by a line, and if a fill color is set, the shape will be filled with that color."}]
methods.syntax: `public final void drawShape(int[] points, boolean close)`

methods.name: void drawEllipse(int x, int y, int width, int height)
methods.content: Draws an ellipse (an oval or a circle) on the canvas
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the left side of the ellipse"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the top of the ellipse"},{"name":"width","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the width of the ellipse"},{"name":"height","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the height of the ellipse"}]
methods.syntax: `public final void drawEllipse(int x, int y, int width, int height)`

methods.name: void drawRectangle(int x, int y, int width, int height)

methods.parameters: [{"name":"instrument","type":"Instrument","required":true,"description":"the instrument to play"},{"name":"note ","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the note to play. 60 represents middle C on a piano."},{"name":"seconds","type":"double","required":true,"description":"length of the note"}]

methods.name: void clear(Color color)
methods.content: Clear the canvas and set the background to the given color.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"color","type":"Color","required":true,"description":"the color to clear the canvas to"}]

methods.name: void drawText(String text, int x, int y, double rotation)
methods.content: Draws text on the image
methods.parameters: [{"name":"text","type":"String","required":true,"description":"the text to draw to the image."},{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"distance from the left side of the image to draw the text, pixels"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"distance from the top of the image to draw the text, in pixels"},{"name":"rotation","type":"double","required":true,"description":"amount to tilt or rotate the text, in degrees. The text will rotate around its center."}]
methods.syntax: `public void drawText(String text, int x, int y, double rotation)`
